channel.title: Problem with Shops [PI]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ic5n52.png[/img]
My problem is that all my shops show that infinite sign circled in red I put this thread here in Client Help because I know that that infinity sign is packed into the cache or something like that I just don't know how to remove it and put it back to showing the current amount of items in a shop. If someone could help me with this it would mean the world to me, thanks!!!
